channel.title: Editing the "Sega" client
channel.description:
Hey, i am now making my first client for an server. i have mixed toghether the files from the orginal server, then put the run file etc from the sega browser witch i got from bloodscape. now its working perfectly. but i want to do 4 things before release,
1: change text color to red 2: change the admin/mod crowns 3: change the text Sega client by ahreok or something to LootEeaters Client v2 4: Add an ::staffzone command, so mods and admins can tele to staff locationg (cordinates are comming) its in the HIM cave
I have read all the guids on here but i cant find anything witch they say i seartch for..
Here is my client:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VY6ZE5LP
Hope some body can help me out. i can do the work. its just i cant find anything when i searth for the stuff in the guids
Regards: Concker
